cleaned_text: Description Pure Potent WOW - Traditional Peppermint Pure Essential Oil. Product Features: - Botanical Name: Mentha Piperita. - Origin: USA. - Plant Part: Leaf. - Extraction Method: Steam Distilled. - Use: For aromatherapy use. NOTE: For all other uses, carefully dillute with a carrier oil prior to use. - Contains 100% pure peppermint essential oil. - Superior therapeutic quality. - Traditionally cultivated. - For external use only - do NOT take internally. - Made in Canada. Suggested Usage: External use only. Do not use essential oils undiluted. Local Application: Blend 4 drops in 20 mL of a carrier oil. Apply to affected area up to 3 times per day. Direct Inhalation: Appy 1-6 drops undiluted essential oil to a tissue and inhale occasionally. Steam Inhalation: Add 3-12 drops of indiluted essential oil to a bowl of steaming water. Inhale slowly and deeply for 5-10 minutes, up to 3 times per day. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes; if this happens, rinse thoroughly with vegetable oil. Keep out of reach of children. If accidental ingestion occurs, seek medical attention or contact a Poison Control Centre. For occasional use only. Consult a health care practitioner is symptoms persist or worsen, or if you have epilepsy or asthma. Do not use this product/discontinue use if you are pregnant or breastfeeding or if you experience nausea, dizziness, headache or an allergic reaction. Avoid exposure of applied area to the sun. If you have broken, irritated or sensitive skin, do not use this product. 12 mL per bottle. Ingredients: Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Essential Oil.
